title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart—the perfect companion for your gardening and yard work, designed with ease and comfort in mind, especially for our senior friends who cherish their time in the garden.

This sturdy green cart is crafted with a solid steel frame and a durable steel mesh bed, ensuring it's strong enough to carry all your supplies without the worry of wear and tear. Its clever design allows for quick and simple assembly, so you'll be ready to roll in no time!

Worried about heavy lifting? Don't be! The Gorilla Cart can easily haul up to 400 lbs of garden tools, plants, or soil. The 10-inch pneumatic tires glide over rough terrain, and the cart offers an impressively tight turn radius and ample ground clearance, making maneuvering around your garden a breeze.

The garden cart comes with a straight pull handle that's gentle on your back, and for those times when you need to carry larger items, the side panels are easily removable, converting the cart into a flatbed in a snap.

Measuring at 34 inches long and 18 inches wide, the cart is spacious enough for your gardening needs while still being easy to store. Plus, at 37 inches tall and weighing just 36.6 pounds, it's the perfect height for comfortable use without straining.

Your peace of mind is important to us, which is why the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty. Make your gardening tasks easier and more enjoyable, even as the years go by. Get your Gorilla Cart today and keep your garden beautiful without the backache!

Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, the perfect companion for all your gardening and outdoor needs. Designed with simplicity and convenience in mind, this cart is ideal for those who enjoy spending time in their garden without the hassle of heavy lifting and cumbersome tools.

Crafted with a sturdy steel mesh frame, this garden cart is built to last and can handle up to 400 pounds with ease. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure a smooth ride over grass, gravel, or dirt, and the tight turn radius makes maneuvering around tight spots a breeze. Plus, the ample ground clearance means you won't get stuck on uneven terrain.

We understand that not everyone is a DIY expert, which is why the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM is designed for quick assembly. You can put it together in no time, and with removable side panels, you can convert it into a flatbed cart to suit your needs – perfect for carrying larger items.

The dimensions of the cart's bed are 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, offering plenty of space for your plants, soil, garden tools, and more. The straight pull handle is comfortable to hold, and the overall height of 37 inches means you won't be straining your back while you work.

Your new garden cart comes in a lovely green color that blends beautifully with your garden surroundings. It's lightweight at only 36.6 pounds, so moving it around is not a chore. For your peace of mind, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM comes with a 1-year limited warranty.

Whether you're a seasoned gardener or just enjoying the outdoors, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is the helping hand you've been waiting for. Make your gardening more enjoyable and less of a strain – add this versatile and dependable cart to your toolshed today!

Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, the perfect companion for your gardening and outdoor chores! This sturdy green cart is designed with simplicity and comfort in mind, ideal for our wise and experienced elders who appreciate a helping hand.

**Key Features:**
- **Strong Steel Frame**: Constructed with a solid steel mesh, this cart is built to last and support up to 400 lbs of your garden supplies, tools, or debris.
- **Easy to Handle**: With its 10-inch pneumatic tires and a tight turn radius, this cart offers smooth maneuverability around tight corners and over rough terrain, ensuring less strain on your back and arms.
- **Convenient Design**: The cart features a smart 4-wheel design for stability and ample ground clearance to easily navigate over bumps and dips in your yard.
- **Versatile Use**: The side panels are a breeze to remove, allowing you to convert it into a flatbed cart for carrying larger items like potted plants or bags of soil.
- **Effortless Assembly**: It comes together quickly, meaning you'll have more time to enjoy your garden and less time fussing with complicated instructions.
- **Comfortable Handling**: A straight pull handle makes pulling this cart feel natural, and the handle's design ensures you won't have to bend over, protecting your posture.
- **Generous Size**: The bed of the cart measures 34 inches long and 18 inches wide, offering plenty of space for all your gardening needs.
- **Peace of Mind**: A 1-year limited warranty backs the cart, giving you confidence in its quality and durability.

At a manageable weight of 36.6 pounds and standing at an overall height of 37 inches, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart ensures you can work in your garden with ease and comfort. Simplify your outdoor tasks and enjoy more time in the sunshine with this reliable garden cart!

Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart: Your Helping Hand in the Garden!

Dear Friends,

Are you looking for a reliable companion to assist you with your gardening or yard work? Look no further! The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is here to make your outdoor chores easier and more enjoyable.

The cart offers ample ground clearance, which means you won't have to struggle over rocks or roots in your garden. Plus, the four-wheel design keeps it stable, no matter the load or the land.

Measuring 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, the cart's bed has plenty of room for all your garden essentials. The straight pull handle is designed for easy towing, so you won't have to strain your back while working in your garden.

For your peace of mind, this cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty. It stands at an overall height of 37 inches and weighs just 36.6 pounds, making it lightweight yet durable. And its lovely green color will look right at home amongst your flowers and greenery.

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is not just a gardening tool; it's a helping hand for all of your outdoor tasks. Make your gardening time more productive and less strenuous. Embrace the joy of working outdoors with this dependable cart by your side.
